data.title: "Two American journalists known for their investigations of the United States' government said Saturday [28 September 2013] they've teamed up to report on the National Security Agency's role in what one called a 'U.S. assassination program.'"
Half of pilots have fallen asleep while flying, with almost 1 in 3 waking up to find the other pilot asleep.
Suspected Islamic militants have slaughtered more than 50 students in a college in Gabja, Nigeria.
John McAfee reveals details on gadget to thwart NSA. And if the U.S. government bans its sale, "I'll sell it in England, Japan, the Third World. This is coming and cannot be stopped."
Greatest threat to Muslim world is extremists who are using Islam as an excuse to commit violence- Malaysian Prime Minister Najib Tun Razak tells UN General Assembly
Top Saudi cleric says women who drive risk damaging their ovaries
Secret Cold War documents reveal NSA spied on US senators
Islamists who demand their own shariah law and exemption from national law in Philippines tried to reignite civil war. 218 dead so far.
Glenn Greenwald working on new NSA revelations - "U.S. assassination program."
Latest Snowden documents reveal that National Security Agency has been exploiting US citizens’ personal information since 2010
